amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for the Agricultural Marketing Service by $15.5 million and increases funding for the Foreign Agricultural Service by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 7 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding for the Agricultural Marketing Service by $15.5 million and to increase funding for the Foreign Agricultural Service by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 198 (Roll no. 302).
